class.name: AnimationEngine
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class for animations. Works with divs, uiComponents, and drawn canvas objects.

method.name: isCanvasObject
method.return: True if the object passed is a drawn canvas object.

method.name: isUiComponent
method.return: True if the object passed is a uiComponent.

method.name: fade
method.description: Fades an object from the given start value to the given end value
method.param: Opacity value at the start of the animation.
Opacity value at the end of the animation.
Duration that the animation should take to complete.

method.name: fadeIn
method.description: Fades an object in from the given value
method.param: Duration that the animation should take to complete.
Opacity value at the end of the animation.

method.name: fadeOut
method.description: Fades an object out from the given values
method.param: Duration that the animation should take to complete.
Opacity value at the start of the animation.
Opacity value at the end of the animation.

method.name: slideUpAndFadeIn
method.description: slides up and fades in an object out from the given yOffset
method.param: Duration that the animation should take to complete.
